text: I like the new compact options for the tile component, finally will be able to make those right side cards that look legit.

Could we get an update on the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-extensions-quickstart|Quickstart Guide>: adding an additional, temporary, pre-requisite of having to opt in to the beta (as well as a link to how to opt in to HubSpot betas)?

Asking as I've seen 2 issues following the Quickstart Guide (including myself) in the HubSpot Community forums - most of which were solved by opting in to the beta.

Thanks again for the awesome work! greatly appreciate you all! :+1:

:alert:We have some exciting new component updates:hurray::star2:
• Added `compact` prop to <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-extension-components#tile|Tile>: helps with more control over layout and optimizing space (as <@U01QVR44MEY> pointed out above :thank-you:)
• Added `title` prop to the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-extensions-sdk#display-alert-banners|alert action>
• Added `title` prop to the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-extensions-sdk#open-an-iframe-in-a-modal|pop-up iframe>
• Added `xs` and `sm` size options for the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-extension-components#action-button|CRMActionButton>
In case you missed it:
• We also recently released <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-extension-components#stepper-input|Stepper Input >which helps with input of numeric values in a user friendly way. You can specify and min and max input as well
Thank you for all your feedback as we keep making this development experience smoother. Keep 'em coming :grinning:
